RelatedSentence: South Korea plans to break up its coastguard in the wake of the ferry disaster in which more than 300 people died , says President Park Geun-hye .
South Korea plans to break up its coastguard in the wake of the ferry disaster in which more than 300 people died , says President Park Geun-hye .
South Korea plans to break up its coastguard in the wake of the ferry disaster in which more than 300 people died , says President Park Geun-hye .
In a televised address , a tearful Ms Park said the final responsibility for the tragedy , lay with her .
She added that in its current form , the coastguard would be unable to prevent another large - scale disaster .
